name: Project Spaceship
description:
In Project Spaceship the player takes control of a lone space-fighter lost in the deep reaches of space. Survive waves of enemies consisting of ships of varying strength and skill.

Default Controls

WThrustATurn LeftDTurn RightSpacebarFire

I began developing Project Spaceship the weekend of 18 April 2020 and released it on 24 April. The game consists of 20 unique levels and an endless number of recurring levels which feature five types of enemies of increasing strength and skill. The player controls a small blue space fighter, and has to defend against each wave to survive.
